message: I'm being generous, but I'm sure you'll see the value in taking this offer. After all, you'll get more than 10% of the money, and I'll take the rest. It's a win-win!
Let's split it in a more reasonable way, considering the inflation, I think this is a good deal for both of us.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal than that. This offer reflects the inflation, but also gives you a fair share. Let's get this done!
Considering the inflation is affecting your share more, I think this is a fair adjustment. It's time to make a deal!
Okay, I'm getting a bit tired of this back and forth.  Let's cut to the chase, I'm willing to accept a smaller share this time around to get this settled.  This offer is my final one.
